entry.title: EXTREME COLD WARNING , Detah

entry.title: Friday: Mainly sunny. High minus 32.

entry.title: Friday night: A few clouds. Low minus 41.
entry.summary: A few clouds. Ice fog patches developing late this evening. Wind up to 15 km/h. Low minus 41. Wind chill minus 43 this evening and minus 51 overnight. Frostbite in minutes. Forecast issued 11:00 AM MST Friday 17 February 2023
